Title: Haohan's Vote III: Pure Poison
Description:
All right, $n. This is our big chance!

Mr. Mudclaw's farm is in big trouble. Those mountain hozen are coming down at night, wrecking his crops and eating his hard-earned harvest.

We've got to get rid of them for good, and I know just how to do it.

Back in the day, my grandpa showed me how to mix a wounding poison to deal with the pests on the farm.

The virmen warrens to the north hold the key ingredients for my mixture.

Don't look so worried, $n! I'm pretty sure this is going to work.
ObjectivesText: Collect 1 Bloodbloom, 1 Cave Lily, 1 Ghostcap, and 1 Violet Lichen.
